quote.issuer_name: Beijing Xunzhong Communication Technology Co., Ltd. - H Shs
quote.nm: Beijing Xunzhong Communication Technology Co., Ltd. - H Shs
quote.summary: Beijing Xunzhong Communication Technology Co Ltd is a China-based company mainly engaged in intelligent cloud communication construction and services. The Company mainly conducts business through three segments. The Cloud-Based Communications Services segment mainly includes communication platform as a service (CPaaS) and contact center software as a service (SaaS). The Project-Based Communications Solutions segment is mainly engaged in the development of solution business based on the personalized needs of customers using various technologies such as data analysis, cloud computing, edge computing and visual recognition. The Other Communications Services and Accessories segment provides other communication services and accessories, mainly including dedicated mobile phones for law enforcement agencies, contact center outsourcing and video conferencing solutions. The Company conducts business in domestic and overseas markets.
